gameExplanationContent:
Guess Challenge is an AI-powered guessing game. The computer secretly selects a character, item, or entity based on the chosen theme ‚Äî such as sports, games, or movies.
You will then be presented with several categories. For each category, you'll see two possible questions ‚Äî choose one, and the AI will answer as if it were the selected entity.
Your goal is to deduce who or what the AI is thinking of before your time or attempts run out.
thinkingQuestion: Get ready! The game is preparing your next question...
verifyingGuessSubtitle: The AI is checking if your answer matches the secret entity.
guessSuccessSubtitle: Amazing! You uncovered the hidden entity.
guessFailSubtitle: Your guess didn't match the secret entity. Try again!
loadingStartGame: The computer is preparing your challenge... please wait!
tourStep1: Click here to start the challenge
tourStep2: Choose the theme you want to play
tourStep3: The Football theme includes players, clubs, and global tournaments
tourStep4: The Games theme includes popular characters and fun challenges
tourStep5: Each level defines attempts and difficulty ‚Äî choose what fits you
tourStepEasy: Easy level is suitable for beginners with more attempts
tourStepMedium: Medium level offers a balanced challenge
tourStepHard: Hard level is for experts with fewer chances
subtitle: We've sent a verification code to your email
resendError: Failed to resend code. Please try again.
youGuessedRightMessage: Great job! You guessed the player correctly.
youGuessedWrongMessage: You didn‚Äôt guess the player this time. Try again!
googleError: An error occurred while signing in with Google.
noGamesSubtitle: Start your first match and enjoy the challenge!
noHistorySubtitle: Play your first match and it will appear here.
comingSoonDescription: This theme will be available soon
leaderboardSubtitle: Top players competing for the top spot
limitReachedDescription: You have used all available categories. This is your moment to make the final guess.
timeUpMessage: You ran out of time before making the final guess.
confirm_guess_message: Are you sure the answer is:
uploadSuccessMessage: Your profile photo has been updated
uploadErrorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again
uploadErrorInvalidType: Please select a valid image file
uploadErrorTooLarge: Image size must be less than 5MB
noPodiumDescription: Start playing to see the top 3 players here
noRankingsDescription: Be the first to score and appear on the leaderboard
startPlayingHint: Start playing now to reach the top!
